blog.source:
## Learner's Hub Dijets Academy offers fundamental courses & modules specifically designed for individuals who are new to the Dijets ecosystem, and advanced courses for those who wish to master the art of configuring, modifying, or even creating entirely new Blockchains, ECCs, or Virtual Machines from scratch. Whether you are new to blockchain space or wish to learn more about cryptocurrencies, Dijets Academy has modules for everyone to gain a comprehensive understanding for. ## Quizzes, Certificates & Incentives Each of Dijets Academy's courses accompany quizzes at the end of each session to test your blockchain knowledge. Successful completion of each course earns you an official Dijets Ceritifcate of achievement with a rewards code that you can redeem for DJT coins.
New to Blockchain?

Head over to Dijets Academy's Crypto 101 Module for crypto basics
